title: What music do you guys listen to while playing league?
body: Pretty straight-forward title, I like listening to rap/trap. What do you guys like listening to? :)

replies.body:
Is this going to post the video? 
https://youtu.be/o9BFZn-l9mo

Generally don't listen to music while playing League, but I've been stuck on lot of Angus & Julia Stone lately.. and sometimes I start games with it. Love their music too much.
thats like the least hype up music ever

Yeah.. this is something personal and I won't go into too much detail, but I can be very easily overwhelmed by stimulation, so I prefer my environment to have a calming down effect rather than hyping up. League is already stressing at times.
the league music, if i listen to anything i like i start humming to it and get distracted

3 words: Siv HD Nightcore



That shit is fucking dank.

I listen to metal when playing League, I mainly listen to Dragonforce because I feel super epic when listening to their songs xD And power metal is just fun c: It's gotta be something that really hypes you up! Like "Yeah! I'm gonna slaughter all my enemies! Whew!" :D

> [{quoted}](name=jb3navides,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PhT6yU2r,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-02T11:59:45.284+0000)
>
> I listen to a variety of songs:
> -rock music from The Pretty Reckless, Kenny Loggins, Bon Jovi, Survivor.
> -weird metal rock from uberdanger's videos.
> -Nightcore.
> 
> I also have **darude sandstorm** in my playlist =P.

Nowadays you literally can't go pass any Youtube video without seeing that name somewhere. _shudders_
Anime opening and ending songs, some New Age music here and there and ofc, anime OSTs and some other OSTs from different albums I like.
